Encounter.Name: Arboreal Octopus Ambush
Encounter.Notes: The octopi are wrapped around low-hanging tree limbs and trunks above an area of interest. PCs may make an [B]opposed Perception vs. Stealth[b] to detect them (add [SETBACK][SETBACK] for unfavorable terrain). Or, have octopi make a [B]opposed Stealth vs. Perception check[b], adding [BOOST][BOOST] and using the best Perception among the PCs.
